import React, { useState } from 'react' import Image from '../../../Components/UI/Images/Image' import SubmitButton from '../../../Components/UI/Button/Button' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import illustrate from '../../../Assets/Imagesused/resetpass.png' import '../Login/Login.css' import "./CreatePass.css" import "../ChangePassword/ChangePass.css" import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup' import * as Yup from 'yup' const CreatePass = () => { const formSchema = Yup.object().shape({ password: Yup.string() .required('Password is required') .min(4, '**Password length should be at least 4 characters') .max(12,'**Password cannot exceed more than 12 characters'), password: Yup.string() .required('Confirm Password is required') .oneOf([Yup.ref('password')], 'Passwords must and should match'), }) const validationOpt = { resolver: yupResolver(formSchema) } const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, reset } = useForm({ mode: "onTouched",validationOpt }); const [toggle1, setToggle1] = useState(false); const [toggle2, setToggle2] = useState(false); const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(data); reset(); } return (

Create Password

{ setToggle1(!toggle1) }}>

{errors.password?.message}

{ setToggle2(!toggle2) }}>
{ password!=cpassword?

**password do not match

: null }

{errors.cpassword?.message}

{/* */}
) } export default CreatePass
